definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Market economy was in its embryonic stages as early as feudalist society.
sentences.chinese: 市場經濟，在封建社會時期就有了萌芽。

sentences.english: In feudal society, the dragon also be regarded as a symbol of the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 在封建社會，龍更被視作帝王的象徵。

sentences.english: This feudal society, beginning with Zhou and Qin Dynasties. lasted about 3000 years.
sentences.chinese: 這個封建社會，從周秦開始，延續了約三千年。

sentences.english: The"accept and hide"system is a very important legal system in China.
sentences.chinese: 容隱制度是我國封建社會的一項重要法律制度。

sentences.english: In the feudal society of absolutism derive the lilliputian of flatter the most easily.
sentences.chinese: 在專制主義的封建社會中，最容易衍生諂諛的小人。

sentences.english: In feudal times, when a man committed a crime, the whole clan was implicated.
sentences.chinese: 在封建社會里，一人犯罪，株連九族。

sentences.english: This historical novel illustrates the breaking up of feudal society in microcosm.
sentences.chinese: 這部歷史小說是走向崩潰的封建社會的縮影。

sentences.english: In feudal society poor people were forbidden to enter the imperial country estate.
sentences.chinese: 封建社會貧民是被禁止進入皇莊的。

sentences.english: Marriage without love is a common situation in Feudalist Society.
sentences.chinese: 無愛的婚姻，是中國封建社會最普遍的婚姻狀況。

sentences.english: The government office of feudal China is a very complex system.
sentences.chinese: 中國封建社會的官衙機構是一個非常龐雜的系統。

sentences.english: The book merely touches on the main contradiction of feudal society， it does not go into it deeply.
sentences.chinese: 這本書僅僅觸及而沒有深刻揭示封建社會的主要矛盾。

sentences.english: The novel expressed a warning in the flourishing age of late feudal society.
sentences.chinese: 《紅樓夢》是封建社會末期的“盛世危言”。

sentences.english: It keeps the same situation in all dynasties of the long feudal society in China.
sentences.chinese: 這種情況在中國漫長封建社會中的歷朝歷代歷來如此。

sentences.english: The Tang Dynasty was the most magnificent period in feudal society.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝是封建社會的鼎盛時期。

sentences.english: In feudal society, unorthodox theories were always ignored.
sentences.chinese: 封建社會貧民是被禁止進入皇莊的。

definition: centralized power (history), e.g. under an Emperor or party
to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
Wei, Jin and North-South dynasties/generic term for historic period 220-589 between Han and Sui
philosophy of idealism, the doctrine that external reality is a product of consciousness
